analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/35/0xe40c3374a3657f1d81279e6ac5b69f4a8d6cecf5.sol:
	Contract MilestonePricing has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/35/0xe40c3374a3657f1d81279e6ac5b69f4a8d6cecf5.sol)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Reentrancy in CrowdsaleBase.finalize (/unique_chucks/35/0xe40c3374a3657f1d81279e6ac5b69f4a8d6cecf5.sol#529-542):
	External calls:
	- finalizeAgent.finalizeCrowdsale() (/unique_chucks/35/0xe40c3374a3657f1d81279e6ac5b69f4a8d6cecf5.sol#541)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- finalized (/unique_chucks/35/0xe40c3374a3657f1d81279e6ac5b69f4a8d6cecf5.sol#542)

	External calls:

	- tokenAmount = pricingStrategy.calculatePrice(weiAmount,weiRaised - presaleWeiRaised,tokensSold,msg.sender,token.decimals()) (/unique_chucks/35/0xe40c3374a3657f1d81279e6ac5b69f4a8d6cecf5.sol#476-480)

	External calls:
	- tokenAmount = fullTokens * 10 ** token.decimals() (/unique_chucks/35/0xe40c3374a3657f1d81279e6ac5b69f4a8d6cecf5.sol#821-822)
	State variables written after the call(s):

CrowdsaleBase.getState (/unique_chucks/35/0xe40c3374a3657f1d81279e6ac5b69f4a8d6cecf5.sol#653-682) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp < startsAt (/unique_chucks/35/0xe40c3374a3657f1d81279e6ac5b69f4a8d6cecf5.sol#666-682)
	- block.timestamp <= endsAt && ! isCrowdsaleFull() (/unique_chucks/35/0xe40c3374a3657f1d81279e6ac5b69f4a8d6cecf5.sol#667-682)

CrowdsaleBase.MAX_INVESTMENTS_BEFORE_MULTISIG_CHANGE should be constant (/unique_chucks/35/0xe40c3374a3657f1d81279e6ac5b69f4a8d6cecf5.sol#308-310)
